title: SUGGESTION: Option to change in game language VO in new alpha client?
body:
How does allowing option for champion and announcer in game VO changes exclusively for the alpha client sound?

As someone who has another language apart from english, I would like to see this to be implicated.
It would make me feel more comfortable too. 

I hope it's not too much to ask? Maybe just an in-client method of making all Champion and announcer VO from other countries accessable?

Please consider!

replies.body: Yeah I definitely support this. I mean hell, it's definitely not an extremely niche and unheard of thing since many people have been using add-on softwares to do exactly that, so why not just make it a part of the options menu (to prevent file clogging and audio taking up extreme amount of space, simply make the options "ticked" and VO would only be downloaded and updated if the whatever language pack is ticked in the options)?
